text: Dahi madagoaa tangada made i di guongo deenei, gei ogo digau ala belee danu tangada made deelaa ne gidee ginaadou di buini dauwa o Moab, gei nia daangada nogo kae tangada made, ga hudu hua a mee gi lodo taalunga o Elisha, gaa llele gi daha. Di madagoaa hua o tangada made dela ne tale gi nia iwi o Elisha, geia gu mouli aga labelaa, ga du gi nua.
